page.title: 04Clubs in Fremington
page.content: There are 30 children in our class, they have all sorts of hobbies. They do them because some injoy them, to relax, to learn, to keep fit or self defance. Some people collect for value others for the aesthetic reasons. There are clubs in Fremington for football tennis, gymnastics, cricket, judo cubs and netball. In the summer holidays, the local churches run a holiday club in the school for the childern. In our village there are no facilities for judo, karati, swimming, babmington, tap_dancing, tennis, horse riding, squash or snooker. People have to go elswere for them. Some adults are in the Womens Institute this started when a group of women got together and talked about how little there was for grown ups to do in the village. They do hobbies and charity work.
